CheckTitle: Log monitoring and alerts are set up for RDS instance configuration changes
Description: It is recommended that a metric filter and alarm be established for RDS Instance configuration changes.
Risk: Monitoring changes to RDS Instance configuration changes may reduce time to detect and correct misconfigurations done on database server.

Recommendation.Text: Logon to SLS Console. Ensure the Action Trail are Enabled. Select Alerts. Ensure alert rule has been enabled for RDS instance configuration changes.
